artist: Artist: Yoda Chikkoku; Artist: Yamamoto Suiun; Artist: Yamamoto Shōtō; Artist: Ōkubo Shibutsu; Artist: Magata Dairei; Artist: Kameda Bōsai
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Betty and Bruce Alberts
description: four different illustrations of flowers with seals and inscriptions: ULQ, small sprig with leaves and tiny yellow and white buds; yellow hollyhock at URQ; magnolia branch LLQ; violets LRC
inscription: UR: 同類殊花総喚葵;　中央土化色堪思;　毿々開向炎風裡;　肯否山人李姓隨　LR: 玉皇前殿掌書仙;　謫在人間経我年;　欲向花王奏心事;　紫毫閑草綵笺　On the back:  文人合作; 龟田鹏斎; 大窪詩佛; 詩書; 勾田台嶺; 依田竹谷; 外二女史畫; 絹本;
markings: UR: 鹏斎; UL: 臺嶺; MC: 翠雲; MR: 艇楼;　天民; LC:　(凌?)寒; 湘桃
signed: UR: 鹏斎; UL: 臺嶺; MC: 翠雲女史; MR: 詩佛老人; LC: 竹谷筆; 湘桃女史
title: Flowers and Poems
